staxel.village.dialogue.MayorGiveItem.li: (안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Is that for the town treasury?
(안함)If more people were as generous as you we'd be in much better shape!
(안함)I think this might be better given to someone else...
(안함)It won't contribute much to the town.
(안함)Sorry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, my duties as mayor come first!
(안함)You want me to move in to your farm?
(안함)Do you think perhaps I should bring some of my furniture with me?
(안함)I haven't been out to your farm in quite some time...
(안함)If I was in your shoes, I would certainly prefer the mayoral home!
